body.name: Dash Camera for Cars,4K Full UHD Car Camera Front Rear with Free 32GB SD Card,Built-in Super Night Vision,2.0'' IPS Screen,170°Wide Angle,WDR,Loop Recording, 24H Parking Mode
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 3 hrs 40 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 25 mins
features: 【4K Full UHD 3 Channel Dash Cam】3 channel camera can record video up to Full UHD 4K( 3840*2160P) on the front and 1080P on the rear, Offering a 170° front camera, a 120° built-in camera and a 150° rear camera, it can simultaneously monitor the front, rear and interior of the vehicle to maximize road coverage, greatly enhance night vision and provide clear and crisp images and videos. The dashcam is a combination of front, rear and interior cameras.

【Dash Camera】The dashcam with super night vision and infrared cabin light uses f/2.0 wide aperture with a total of 6 layers of optical lens and WDR technology, coupled with 4 infrared lights, enabling the car camera to show good color accuracy and clearly capture important details day or night.

【Car Camera - Dash Cam Front and Rear】When the storage limit on the memory card is reached, the latest record will automatically overwrite the old record. Automatically detects sudden shocks/collisions and locks emergency footage to prevent video from being overwritten during loop recording. Thanks to the heat-resistant chipset and adhesive pad, the car dashcam can be well attached to the windshield at extreme hot or cold operating temperatures from -40 ° F to 185 ° F.

【Dash Cam Front and Rear】The dash camera comes with a free U3 32GB Micro-SD memory card. Plug and play does not need to be purchased separately. The front camera can be easily installed anywhere on the windshield and connected to a power source, while the rear camera is simple to install and can be used by connecting to the front lens without removing the reverse headlight

【Dash Camera for Cars 】24-hour parking mode, the dashcam will automatically switch to parking mode when you stop and turn off. It can record continuously for 24 hours in parking mode, and has time-delay recording function to record continuously with low power consumption and low frame rate, providing all-weather protection for your car. (Please note: this product does not have it, so you will need to purchase a hardware kit to enable it)Vidgist.
Attention: Remove the screen protective film before use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Loop Recording 2 4K Full UHD Dash Camera
Previous page Next page 1 Installation guide 2 Rear camera is waterproof

How do I enable the 24 parking monitoring function? Do I need to purchase a hardware package separately? Yes, you need to purchase a hardware kit connected to enable 24/7 parking monitoring. After the engine is turned off, 24 hours of video is automatically captured. (Note: Hardware kit must be purchased separately) How many times can the driving recorder be used normally in hot and cold weather? It uses supercapacitors, which are more heat-resistant and do not pose a danger of overheating or exploding. The operating temperature of the recorder is -4°F and 155°F, at which the recorder can work normally. Can the rear camera be mounted on a vertical window? There are two installation methods. The first is installed on the inside of the rear window of the car, and the second can be installed on the vertical external glass with waterproof function. Can someone tell me if all three cameras work at the same time? How does the rear camera record? Yes, this dashcam works on three screens at once. If you don't install a rear camera, it will only record two front and interior views. Why do I always have to format the memory card with the dashcam? Buying the Azacvb dashcam comes with a 32GB memory card that asks you to format the locked video when it's full. The recording time can be increased 16 times to ensure the integrity of the video.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love it, really worth the price and works really well. Easy to install and so clear both day and night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Esay to install, has a great picture also nice to have a memory card included along with a back up camera. and a see behind feature as well. also comes at a great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy installation and good product for the price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The installation of the front camera is fast and easy, but the rear-one requires a little more workI liked the fact that they included a 32GB SD card compatible with the recording high-speed (saved me time and $)The camera is quite small, yet wide-angle but does not get obstructed by the mirror or the windshield frit pattern (see picture) Note that only the from camera its recorded in memory, the 2 other ones are not. The daytime recording is fair (attached snapshot) but the quality of “in-built super-night vision” is slightly deceiving (see video). Overall it’s a good purchase and I hope it will last several years of un-interrupted recording

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simpler setup than expected
reviews.reviewText: A rear end hit and run prompted my first thought of a dash cam. A year later research led me to this one, the Azacvb unit. All I neee was:- simple setup and use- a clear display- front, interior, and rear views- a reasonable priceSo far, so good on all points. Setting up the main unit took maybe 15 minutes to hide the wiring. I used a blunt bike tire replacement took to push the wire between the trim but could easily have just used my fingers. Clearly marked buttons on the bottom of the unit made choosing which views to display easy. Changing that view is equally simple - just toggle back and forth. Keeping the cam plugged into the car's 12v port means it turns on and off with your engine.It comes with own sd card so you don't have to know which type or capacity to buy separately. Basically this unit is plug and play. Simple.I only connected the rear camera this morning after using the cam flawlessly for 2 1/2 weeks with the front and interior views. The displays are a bit over exposed with the sky blown out on very bright days. But it isn't extreme and license plates etc., are clearly visible, so not a deal breaker.Caution, most newer vehicles have a sensor box behind the rear view mirror. I attached my cam too close to it so it blocks a small amount of the peripheral view to camera left (see photo). A second double sided tape came with the unit so I can reposition it when I'm ready - it hasn't posed a problem yet.The rear view looks good. If issues come up I'll update this review.Disclosure: 2 weeks after my purchase the seller requested a review and provided an incentive. I'd already formed a positive opinion and am glad to share it above.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Value Dashcam
reviews.reviewText: This 4K Dashcam is a great value for additional driving assurance. The price is reasonable, and it comes with both a front-facing and rear camera, as well as a 32 GB SD card. The front-facing camera also has an vehicle interior camera as well. The camera adhesive is pretty sturdy on the windshield. The camera has pretty good picture quality for the price. Camera installation difficulty is relative to each vehicle, but be sure to hide the wires as much as possible. Users need to format the SD card prior to using the camera. The instructions are minimal, so be sure to watch a few Youtube videos prior to installation. The menu selection for the camera is cumbersome, however.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dashcam for the price
reviews.reviewText: Works great for the price. Clear video and easy to use and install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The perfect "I hope I dont need it" product
reviews.reviewText: If you're buying a dash cam, its probably because you want the piece of mind that if anything happens, you have adequate evidence of the incident. This camera very easily records a front view, and an interior cabin view. With provided cables and some handyman skills, you can also fairly easily record a rear view as well. It comes with everything you need (even an SD card) and set up is very simpleThe front view camera's field of view is lacking (when positioned directly in the center, you can see most of the window's view out with some edges cut)The interior cabin camera's field of view is incredibly small. I can only see the passenger seat and nothing else. Would really like a wider field for this. (granted, I drive a small hatchback, and the camera ends up quite close to the persons face)The rear view camera is solid, not movie quality by any means but does the job.At the end of the day, if you are buying this purely to have a backup recording in case of an accident, its great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: it was easy to set up. the memory card it comes with is fine. the camera that records the inside of the car isn't great but it's ok. you can't adjust it to record someone at your driver-side window, like a cop. the menu is easy to navigate. I would say it's pretty good for the money I paid for it.
